attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the Govt appears incapable of delivering any project on time and anywhere near the original estimate or bid, they whole government should resign and a general election be called immediately. All current ministers, due to the lack of competency should be barred from standing as anything other than backbench MP's. The current Culture Secretary has demonstrated an inability to deliver on any role so far and therefore must be considered as a failure.
